code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph ExternalSources[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        A[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        B[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        C[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        D[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    end

    A --> E[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    B --> E
    C --> E
    D --> E

    E --> F{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
    
    F --> G[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    G --> H[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    H --> I[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    I --> J[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    
    J --> K[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    
    subgraph APILayer [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        L[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        M[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        N[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        O[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    end
    
    K --> L
    L --> M
    L --> N
    L --> O
    
    M --> P[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    N --> Q[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    O --> R[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    
    P --> S[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    Q --> T[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    R --> U[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    
    %% Optional enhancements:
    J --> V[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    V --> W[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    
    U --> X[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    X --> M
